Articles.Content:
Can someone give me a link to the Unity to use with KSP, it has been ages since I have used it and I want to work on some IVA prop stuff. 

Thanks!

Moving post to right area to ask, wrong thread.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T00:32:57Z" title="05/03/2015 12:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by therealcrow999**

[Here](https://unity3d.com/unity/personal-edition)

Not to hijack your thread, but has anyone gotten this to work in linux?
